com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.text

Interface Font

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitmapFont

    public interface Font
    Font interface.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FontChar getCharacter(int id)
      Returns the specified character of this font.
      android.util.SparseArray<Texture> getTexturePages()
      Returns the textures that contain the characters of this font, indexed by page ID.
      void loadFromFile(java.lang.String path, android.content.Context context)
      Loads this font's data from the specified file.
      float measureLineHeight(float fontSizePx)
      Measures the height of a line of text if it was rendered at the specified size in pixels using this font.
      float measureLineWidth(java.lang.String line, float fontSizePx)
      Measures the width in pixels of the specified line of text if it was rendered at the specified size in pixels using this font.
